revision.text:
{{for|the German writer|Jürgen Becker (poet)}}
[[Image:Jürgen Becker - 2007 - 8295.jpg|thumb|right|Jürgen Becker at "Kölner Herztag" 2007 („Kölner Infarkt Modell“) in Cologne.]]
'''Jürgen Becker''' (born August 27, 1959) is a [[Germany|German]] [[comedian]], [[kabarett]] artist, and actor.
== Life == Becker was born and attended school in [[Cologne]], [[Germany]]. He became a [[graphic designer]] in the German company [[4711 (brand)|4711]]. Later Becker studied [[social science]] in Cologne.
In 1983, Becker was a founding member of ''[[Stunksitzung]]'' in Cologne, and he was its president from 1984 to 1995. Since 1992 Becker has performed in the television show [[Mitternachtsspitzen]].
== Filmography ==
* ''[[Knockin' on Heaven's Door (1997 film)|Knockin’ on Heaven’s Door]]'', 1997
